The former Massachusetts governor joins some political leaders and residents in the predominantly white New Hampshire town of Wolfeboro in calling for the resignation of Robert Copeland , according to The Associated Press .
A resident said she overheard the 82 - year - old Copeland use a slur a restaurant in March and wrote to the town manager .
